long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The tweet alert extension will alert you when and read the tweet for you, you will get an easy way to stay updated with new tweets from your favorite users on real time.

Tweet alert extension provides you with a filter to only read the tweets that are important to you.

It integrates with Twitter Deck easly.

What can you do with Tweet Alert: 
 
1. Never miss a tweet that is important to you. 
2. Stop losing time looking at the Twitter screen and focus on what's matter the most.
3. Tweet Alert will read the tweet for you which prevent you from having stray eyes.
4. The text to speech feature will read the tweet content of new tweets automatically 
Here’s how to get started:

1. Download the extension in the Chrome Store.
2. Go to https://tweetdeck.twitter.com/
3. Add your favorite users or lists of users.
4. Click on the extension to filter only what is important.
5. Click on unmute on the bottom right of the tweet deck page.
